text: - - - EXAMINATION
Just a couple more questions from me, as well. Immediately prior to the accident, were there any visibility issues?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: After the accident?
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Before the accident.
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: No, nothing at all.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Can you describe what the van was doing immediately before the accident?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Immediately before the accident?
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Yeah.
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Shift lane very fast.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: What lane was that van in when you first saw it?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Like I said, for the first time, he was in the far lane and then he shift into the middle lane and then he shift into our lane very fast.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: You said the first time that you saw the van was on the far-right lane?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Yeah, the right lane.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Then that van shifted to the middle?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Yes.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Do you know why that van shifted to the middle?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: I think because the traffic blocking. That's why he needed to change lanes.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: How long was that van in the middle lane before it shifted to the left lane?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Very fast.  I think about five seconds.  He shift right away.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Do you know why that van shifted from the middle lane to the left lane?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Yes, because some car cut in front of him.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: What color was that car?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: I don't remember.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Was it a sedan or SUV, if you remember?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: I don't remember because all I pay attention was our car and his car.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: The road in that area, is it flat, uphill, downhill?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: It tilts downhill a little bit, but it tilt, though.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: A little bit?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: A little bit.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: How many times have you been in a vehicle with Mr. Nguyen prior to this accident?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: How many time have I been?
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: How many times has Mr. Nguyen driven you before the accident happened?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Before the accident?
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Yes.
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: I think about twice.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Two times?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Yes, two times.  That's it.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Did Mr. Nguyen ever get into an accident those two times he was driving you before the accident?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: No.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: When you told Mr. Nguyen to slow down, did Mr. Nguyen slow down?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: I think so.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: How long before the accident did you tell Mr. Nguyen to slow down?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Lake I said, somewhere around two minutes, one or two minutes.  It's very close by, though.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Mr. Nguyen slowed down about two minutes before the accident?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Two minutes, yes.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Did you talk to any witnesses after the accident?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Any witness?
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Yes.
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: No, I talked to the police.  That's it.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: What other conversation did you have with the other driver of the car after the accident?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: We talk about the accident, and I told him you switched lanes too fast.  He said, yeah, I'm sorry, but I didn't see you guys.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Did you have any other conversations with him?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Yes, we talk about it.  We talked about something like how are you doing and are you okay and how is your van, how is your car.  He take pictures, and the drivers exchange with each other.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Was the car you were in drivable after the accident?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Yes.  We have to get to an appointment for Mr. Nguyen.  For the first time, he said. He cannot drive.  I said you have to drive it because we tried to make an appointment, and you would be in trouble.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Do you recall what time the accident happened?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: I think early in the morning somewhere around 8:30 or 9:00.  We went really early.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: You said the appointment was around 12:00 or 1:00?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Yeah, late, very late.  Yes, late, that's why we have to go down there.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: You left extremely early.  You said it took about two-and-a-half hours from Philadelphia to?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Delaware.  Plus, we don't want to miss an appointment.  That's why we have to go early.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Have you had any surgery as a result of this accident?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: No.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Have you paid any co-pays as a result of this accident?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: No.
speaker: THE WITNESS

text: Counsel, we already confirmed no wage loss, no claim for past or future earnings?
speaker: MS. KATHOPOULIS

text: Correct.
